name: Maup
description:
You're a cartographer who wasn't labeling maps due to laziness. Now you must figure out which of your maps is accurate for a variety of areas! Your performance will determine your ending.

This was my first time using Godot and this game was made for the 10th Alakajam. I actually learned Godot during the jam itself, which gave me a hard time.

The Linux build is untested.
